title: Bare cupboard cake
ingredients: ['200g caster sugar', '2 tablespoons margarine or oil', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground nutmeg', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '175g raisins, currants or sultanas', '350ml water', '250g plain flour', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda']
